channel.title: Omg look!
channel.description: please help me guys ive been trying to fix this forever... i can log onto my server in 127.0.0.1 but i cant log in on it when i try the real ip for it... i want to make it so i can log into it on the ip and other people can to... ive done everything... port fowerding, no-ip, paths, java stuff, ive done everything but it still doesnt work some1 please [u][b]HELP ME[/b][/u]...

item.title: Omg look!
item.dc:creator: @yurmoma1023 yurmoma1023
item.description:
@yurmoma1023 wrote:

tom is beast:

yah he might be right bc i still cant get other peeps in my serve… hmmmm uhhhh my ip says the last part is 101 but on my router info my ports last part is 100? and in my game app part its 101… so the game app part is actually right and the router isnt? im confused…

justy change in ur port forward the 101 to the 100 and save then it should work fine…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2008, 05:42:16 PM[/size][hr]then other ppl should be able to logg onto ur server[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2008, 05:46:15 PM[/size][hr]and if u have no-ip it has to be running

Read full topic

item.title: Omg look!
item.dc:creator: @tom_is_beast tom is beast
item.description:
@tom_is_beast wrote:

okay then…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 22, 2008, 02:28:29 PM[/size][hr]so u guys are saying if i log in on my real ip or 0.0.0.0 other peeps can get in my server?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 22, 2008, 05:09:02 PM[/size][hr]well my server stilll will not allow peeps to log in on it… do i hav to add the code to the client.java or is there somthing i have hav to run while i am running the server so they can get in…?

Read full topic

item.title: Omg look!
item.dc:creator: @joeyjuggalo joeyjuggalo
item.description:
@joeyjuggalo wrote:

Since your the host that ip his default (local host) so your the only one who can login from that ip if you hit “start” it will say ’ port already in use?’ and chances are noone else will b able to get on. so ignore that.

Read full topic

item.title: Omg look!
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

well from what i know of, you have to log into your server as 127.0.0.1, but other people have to use ur actual ip, its because your running the server as your local host. so just dont worry about you having to type your server name in. its just alot easier for u i guess
